name: The Princess is the Bad Guy
name_original: The Princess is the Bad Guy
description:
The Princess is the Bad Guy is a Shoot them up made for the GBJAM 9 where you must vanquish a spirited princess.

Take out giant pink sheeps with your ship and defeat the princess to stop her nefarious plans which, to be quite honest, you don’t know the nature of.

Three music included (and more to come in the post jam version)

A boss.

And probably bugs, but hey, that’s to be expected right… Right?

Made by MarcRobin and Norinios.

Controls:

- WASD/Arrow Keys = Move the spaceship

- Space/A Button on controllers = Shoot
